author: Lon.TV
description:
See more like this :https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz - I wrote a negative review of a device that I purchased on Amazon that did not meet its marketed claims. A few weeks later, a letter showed up from a "D Deng" bribing me to remove it for $20. Let's dig into this scam. Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:09 - Background on my product review
02:14 - What happened afer my review
03:42 - Digging into the Scam Letter
05:56 - Return Address Goes to a UPS Store
06:49 - Other letters customers have received
08:33 - What is Amazon doing about it?
08:57 - How to report to Amazon

title: I got a letter trying to bribe me to delete a negative review! The " D Deng " Scam
